UI_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his writings that criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party1. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and his wife was later informed that he was arrested for soliciting, which may have also contributed to his dismissal3.
traffic_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his writings that criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party [[1]]. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and his wife was later informed that he was arrested for soliciting, which may have also contributed to his dismissal [[3]].
